name: pod-protocol
description: PoD Protocol (Prompt or Die) - The Ultimate AI Agent Communication Protocol on Solana ⚡️

scripts.postinstall: echo '🎉 PoD Protocol workspace setup complete! Run bun run start for guided setup.'
scripts.start: echo '🎭 Welcome to PoD Protocol!' && node scripts/onboarding-wizard.js
scripts.setup:dev: echo '🔧 Setting up enhanced development environment...' && node scripts/dev-experience-enhancer.js
scripts.build: echo '🚀 Building all PoD Protocol components...' && bun run build:all
scripts.build:all: bun run build:sdk && bun run build:sdk-js && bun run build:cli && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:verify: bun run build:all && bun run test:basic
scripts.dev: echo '⚡️ Starting enhanced development mode...' && bun run dev:enhanced
scripts.test: echo '🧪 Running PoD Protocol test suite...' && bun run test:all
scripts.test:all: bun run test:sdk && bun run test:sdk-js && bun run test:cli && bun run test:integration
scripts.test:basic: echo '🔍 Running basic functionality tests...' && cd tests && bun run test:basic
scripts.lint: echo '🔧 Linting all PoD Protocol components...' && bun run lint:all
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint:sdk && bun run lint:sdk-js && bun run lint:cli && bun run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning all build artifacts...' && bun run clean:all
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:sdk && bun run clean:sdk-js && bun run clean:cli && bun run clean:frontend
scripts.publish:prepare: echo '📦 Preparing PoD Protocol packages for publishing...' && bun run clean && bun run build:verify
scripts.upgrade: echo '⬆️ Upgrading PoD Protocol dependencies...' && bun update && bun run build:verify
scripts.audit: echo '🔍 Auditing PoD Protocol security...' && bun audit
scripts.docs: echo '📚 Generating documentation...' && cd docs && bun run build

author: PoD Protocol Team
